resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/106771</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>106771</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206344</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">September 11, 2001, Documentary Project</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">September 11, 2001, Dokumentarisches Projekt</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">11 septembre 2001, Projet Documentaire</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Setembro 11, 2001, Projeto Documentary</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">11 Settembre 2001, Progetto Documentario</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">11 Σεπτεμβρίου ..2001, αποδεικτικό πρόγραμμα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">11 de Septiembre De 2001, Proyecto Documental</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">captures eyewitness accounts, reactions, and opinions of people in the months after the terrorist attacks on the World Trade Center, the Pentagon, and United Airlines Flight 93. This online presentation includes nearly 200 audio and video interviews, 45 photos and drawings, and 21 written narratives.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sicherungen Augenzeuge berechnet, Reaktionen und 
Meinungen der Leute in den Monaten nachdem die Terroristangriffe auf 
der Welthandel-Mitte, dem Pentagon und vereinigtem Fluglinien Flug 93.
Diese Onlinedarstellung enthält fast 200 Audio und 
videointerviews, 45 Fotos und Zeichnungen und 21 schriftliche 
Darstellungen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">le témoin oculaire de saisies rend compte, des 
réactions, et des avis des personnes en mois après que les attaques 
de terroriste sur le centre commercial mondial, le Pentagone, et le 
vol uni 93 de lignes aériennes. Cette présentation en ligne 
inclut presque 200 sonores et entrevues visuelles, 45 photos et 
schémas, et 21 récits écrits.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">a testemunha ocular das captações explica, 
reações, e opiniões dos povos nos meses depois que os ataques do 
terrorista no centro de comércio de mundo, no pentagon, e no vôo 
unido 93 das linhas aéreas. Esta apresentação em linha inclui
quase 200 audio e as entrevistas video, as 45 fotos e desenhos, e 21 
narrativas escritas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">il testimone oculare di bloccaggi spiega, reazioni
ed opinioni della gente nei mesi dopo che gli attacchi del terrorista 
al centro di commercio mondiale, al pentagono ed al volo 93 di 
United Airlines. Questa presentazione in linea include quasi 200 
audio e video interviste, 45 foto ed illustrazioni e 21 descrizione 
scritta.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">συλλαμβάνει τους απολογισμούς αυτοπτών μαρτύρων, τις 
αντιδράσεις, και τις απόψεις των ανθρώπων στους μήνες μετά από 
τις τρομοκρατικές επιθέσεις στο κέντρο παγκόσμιου εμπορίου, το 
Πεντάγωνο, και την ενωμένη πτήση 93 αερογραμμών. Αυτή η 
σε απευθείας σύνδεση παρουσίαση περιλαμβάνει σχεδόν 200 
ηχητικές και τηλεοπτικές συνεντεύξεις, 45 φωτογραφίες και 
σχέδια, και 21 γραπτά αφηγήματα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">el testigo presencial de las capturas considera, 
las reacciones, y las opiniones de la gente en los meses después de 
que los ataques del terrorista contra el centro de comercio mundial, 
el pentágono, y el vuelo unido 93 de las líneas aéreas. Esta 
presentación en línea incluye casi 200 audio y las entrevistas 
video, 45 fotos y gráficos, y 21 narrativas escritas.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206344</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>106771</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/september-11-2001-documentary-project</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
